channel.title: Racism, is it against the rules?
channel.description:
I would like a definitive answer here. Does using the word "nigger" constitute a punishment? Especially when not directed at a particular individual (i.e as a flame). As far as I can see (and by using common sense) it doesn't seem to break any rules. This is not a playground for little children, and using "offensive" language here is commonplace.
This is no way related to any of my previous posts, I would just like to know if it is explicitly against the rules.

item.title: Racism, is it against the rules?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

This thread is good. Locked because its awesomeness may overtake the rest of the forum.

Or perhaps you’re all twats, I forgot which.

Read full topic

item.title: Racism, is it against the rules?
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

Epic One:

NIGGERS ARE NOT AFRICAN AMERICANS

If you live in Africa, you don’t have to be an African American but you are a nigger.

R.I.P RSC:

Where the fuck do you see niggers else where? Asians aren’t really black, they are yellow. And Native-Americans are red, so that only leaves Africa.

Indigenous Australians They look pretty black to me.

@lothy wrote:

I agree with frank_, minus the insults (this is a public post, afterall). :rolleyes:

Nobody wants, nor needs, the opinion of a an ex moderator who has disgraced himself. Especially an ex-moderator that shares many characteristics with tics, leeches, and other parasites.

item.title: Racism, is it against the rules?
item.dc:creator: @teplin teplin
item.description:
@teplin wrote:

Do you people even know what an Arab is at all?

ThAt0n36Uy:

Honestly, I doubt most people here actually mean it in a hateful way when they say it. So I mean unless someone says it out of spite then it shouldn’t really be punished. In my opinion.

Unfortunately I removed my Nigger Quotes list, but some people on here like moparisthebest have seen it.
Hundreds of quotes where people on IRC and the forums mean it in a hateful way, all towards the same person, me.

frank_, I don’t really care if I’m ban evading.
I came up with something; Every time Casey. evades a ban on my site, I evade a ban on here.
[center] Who do you think you are? You are no longer welcome here.[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Racism, is it against the rules?

item.title: Racism, is it against the rules?
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“teplin, post:57, topic:227177”]You people claim anybody that is not either from America, England or Australia, or anybody that does not have a plain white skin color like a paper to be black.
What’s the point of this thread if the majority of active people here on mitb that seem to have some sense…, claim Arabs to be black?

really, who here is black? (apart from ikikifag but we got rid of him)

[quote]
<~Ikiliki[God]> Cowie`, I’m still thinking about it and how funny casey actually is.
<~Ikiliki[God]> He has never done anything really, apart from begging me for access to google, which he is still doing.
<~Ikiliki[God]> l00l
<~Ikiliki[God]> u noob!!11
<~Ikiliki[God]> :’(
[/quote][/quote]no one cares what ban evading nigger dutchies think

Read full topic
